name: CAT (SAE Brisbane Games)
description:
This game is a representation of what it's like to own My Cat.

Controls are WASD. Your goal is simple, rearrange the room by putting the objects in their right places.

Look out though. Steve's gotten into some bad habbits, and is not going to make your job easy. Also! I forgot to mention, your family is on their way! Better get cracking.
